name: Doomnomitron's Doom
description:
Hello! So I was going for a rick and morty themed game but it is gonna take me a long time thinking about dialogues and stuff since I am not really a creative person so I am just gonna leave it here.

Its a complete game with 3 unique levels and loads of fun.

May be a bit hard but it was either boring or hard so I chose hard.

Also, it does not pause on the instruction page after a level loads. I have been trying to figure it out for a long time but I could not and my deadline is up.

Win a level for a surprise

Craving for feedback....
